original_title: Sri Lanka gets new ‘Cricket Selection Committee’
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1sta); Sri Lanka Cricket wishes announced a new ‘Cricket Selection Committee’ for a period of two years to select national teams.
The appointment of the new committee, which comes into immediate effect, was made by the Minister of Sports and Youth Affairs, Harin Fernando.
The Minister made the appointments after taking into consideration the names nominated by Sri Lanka Cricket, said SLC.
The first official task of the Selection Committee will be to select the national squad for the Zimbabwe Tour of Sri Lanka 2024.
